devdoc.details: This contract is to be used as a diamond facet (see ERC2535 Diamond Standard https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-2535).Note: This facet depends on {ProxyAdminFacet}, {InterfaceDetectionFacet} and {AccessControlFacet}.

batchMint(address,uint256[]).details: Reverts if the sender does not have the 'minter' role.Reverts if one of `tokenIds` has been previously burnt.

params.to: Address of the new tokens owner.
params.tokenIds: Identifiers of the tokens to mint.

initERC721MintableOnceStorage().details: Reverts if the sender is not the proxy admin.

mint(address,uint256).details: Reverts if the sender does not have the 'minter' role.Reverts if `tokenId` has been previously burnt.

params.to: Address of the new token owner.
params.tokenId: Identifier of the token to mint.

safeMint(address,uint256,bytes).details: Reverts if the sender does not have the 'minter' role.Reverts if `tokenId` has been previously burnt.

params.data: Optional data to pass along to the receiver call.
params.to: Address of the new token owner.
params.tokenId: Identifier of the token to mint.

devdoc.title: ERC721 Non-Fungible Token Standard, optional extension: Mintable (facet version).

batchMint(address,uint256[]).notice: Unsafely mints a batch of tokens.

initERC721MintableOnceStorage().notice: Marks the following ERC165 interface(s) as supported: ERC721Mintable.

wasBurnt(uint256).notice: Gets whether a token was burnt.

userdoc.notice: ERC721Mintable implementation where burnt tokens cannot be minted again.
